title: Just got my League account back from someone who stole it, how can I get my friends back?
body:
I took a break from playing League a couple months back, and when I came back to play, I noticed my account wasn't connected to my e-mail.

After checking Lolking, I realized someone has been playing on it recently, so I guessed it was stolen and messaged riot to get it back. All props to Riot and their Blitzcrank bot, I got it back within hours!

However, and I have not yet gotten an answer about this from support yet, the person deleted my entire old friends list, and replaced it with a dozen of his own. These are friends i've made over many years of playing league, and i'm kind of bummed out to lose them.

Is there any way to get a "Friends history", or for riot to reset my account to what it was like a few months ago? I don't mind losing the RP and IP he stole too much, that's no big deal, but I can't really replace the friends list I had a great time with.

Hope someone can help!

TLDR: Account stolen, got it back, want to know how to get friends list back.

replies.body: I wish I had good news to bring you as it really does suck that all your friends were deleted. Unfortunately we're unable to do so as we don't keep friends lists on a backup :(

Cheers, it's too bad but the response is appreciated. Would there be any use in looking into who stole my account on my end? Or should I just not bother. I still have the chat history of the person with his new friends.
